template.template: SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0
template.name: SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0
template.description: Contacts: saftehnika.com, techsupport@saftehnika.com. Template for SAF radio Integra-X.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/CPU_load_Integra_X)>80
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/CPU_load_Integra_X)<75
trigger.name: CPU load {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/Firmware_version_raw,#2)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/Firmware_version_raw)
trigger.name: FW changed {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0
trigger.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

item.name: WANHP dropped bits
item.description: All CoSQ dropped packets.

item.name: WANLP dropped bits
item.description: All CoSQ dropped bytes WANLP

item.name: WAN egress traffic
item.description: the traffic at the moment of request

item.name: WANHP Egress traffic packets per second
WANLP Egress traffic packets per second
WANHP Ingress traffic packets per second
WANLP Ingress traffic packets per second
LSP port blocked by LSP advanced
LAN1 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1)=2
trigger.name: LAN1 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1,#2)
trigger.name: LAN1 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: LAN2 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2,#2))
trigger.name: LAN2 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2)=2
trigger.name: LAN2 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: LAN3 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3,#2)
trigger.name: LAN3 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: LAN1 Port Speed
item.description: Link speed in 1 000 000 * bits per second.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN1,#2)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN1)
trigger.name: LAN1 Port Speed {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN2,#2)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN2)
trigger.name: LAN2 Port Speed {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN3,#2)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN3)
trigger.name: LAN3 Port Speed {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=1
trigger.name: LAN1 port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN1 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=1
trigger.name: LAN2 port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN2 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=1
trigger.name: LAN3 port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN3 administrative status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3)=2

item.name: ACM engine status ModemA
item.description: ACM engine status

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2
trigger.name: Modem A not synced

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAerroredSecond))>1
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAerroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem A errored second count {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

item.name: ModemA errored second ratio
item.description: Modem performance errored second ratio

item.name: FEC load ModemA
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value (floating point in textual representation)

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAfecLoad)>={$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.name: Modem A FEC load {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

item.name: ModemA modulation ACMmax
item.description: Maximal modulation for ACM enabled profile

item.name: ModemA modulation ACMmin
item.description: Minimal modulation for ACM enabled profile

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAnormalizedMse)>={$MSEMIN}
trigger.name: Modem A MSE {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

trigger.name: Modem A Rx Capacity {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

trigger.name: Modem A Actual Rx modulation {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

item.name: ModemA severely Errored seconds
item.description: Modem performance severely errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAseverelyErroredSecond))>=10
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAseverelyErroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem A SES count {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

item.name: ModemA severely Errored second ratio
item.description: Modem performance severely errored second ratio

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: Modem A temperature {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAtxCapacity,#2)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAtxCapacity)

dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

item.description: XPD Estimated value (floating point value multiplied by 10)

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBerroredSecond))=0

item.name: ModemB errored seconds ratio
item.description: Modem performance errored second ratio

item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBfecLoad)>={$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.name: Modem B FEC Load {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem B not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1

item.description: Maximal modulation for ACM enabled profile

item.name: ModemB modulation ACMmin
item.description: Minimal modulation for ACM enabled profile

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBnormalizedMse)>={$MSEMIN}
trigger.name: Modem B MSE {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBrxCapacity,#2)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBrxCapacity)
trigger.name: Modem B Rx Capacity {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1

trigger.name: Modem B Actual Rx modulation {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio B PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1

item.name: ModemB severely Errored seconds
item.description: Modem performance severely errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBseverelyErroredSecond))>10
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBseverelyErroredSecond))<5
trigger.name: Modem B SES errors {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem B not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio B PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1

item.name: ModemB severely Errored seconds ratio
item.description: Modem performance severely errored second ratio

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: Modem B temperature {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBtxCapacity,#2)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBtxCapacity)
trigger.name: Modem B Tx Capacity {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem B not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio B PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1

trigger.name: Modem B Actual Tx modulation {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem B not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio B PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1

item.name: ModemB XPD estimated
item.description: XPD Estimated value (floating point value multiplied by 10)

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"
trigger.name: Operational mode A

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"
trigger.name: Operational mode B

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"XPIC" or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"ACAP"
trigger.name: Operational mode not XPIC or ACAP

item.name: IP address Local
item.description: Local IP address

item.name: IP Address Remote
item.description: Remote IP address

item.name: Duplex shift RadioA
item.description: Utilized duplex shift in kHz

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1
trigger.name: Radio A PLL Error

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioArxFrequency)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioArxFrequency,#2)
trigger.name: Radio A Rx frequency change {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioArxLevel),{$RXLEVMIN},{$RXLEVMAX})=0
trigger.name: Radio A Rx level {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Operational mode B
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="B"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioAtxFrequency)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioAtxFrequency,#2)
trigger.name: Radio A Tx frequency change {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: Tx power RadioA
item.description: Output power of radio transmitter

item.name: Duplex shift RadioB
item.description: Utilized duplex shift in kHz

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1
trigger.name: Radio B PLL Error

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBrxFrequency)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBrxFrequency,#2)
trigger.name: Radio B Rx frequency change {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBrxLevel),{$RXLEVMIN},{$RXLEVMAX})=0
trigger.name: Radio B Rx level {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Operational mode A
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="A"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBtxFrequency)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBtxFrequency,#2)
trigger.name: Radio B Tx frequency change {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysBoardTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System Board Temperature {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: Coordinates
item.description: System CPU temperature

item.name: CPU Idle
item.description: System CPU idle

item.name: CPU temperature
item.description: System CPU temperature

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysCPUtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: CPU temperature {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysDeviceProductModel)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysDeviceProductModel,#2)
trigger.name: Product Model changed {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: Serial Number
item.description: Device serial number

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysDeviceSerial)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysDeviceSerial,#2)
trigger.name: Radio HW changed {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysFanError)=1 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysFanError)=2
trigger.name: Fan alarm

item.name: PSU current
item.description: PSU current in ampers

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysPSUcurrent),{$PSUCURRMIN},{$PSUCURRMAX})=0
trigger.name: System PSU current {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysPSUpower),{$PSUPOWMIN},{$PSUPOWMAX})=0
trigger.name: System PSU power {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysPSUvoltage),{$PSUVOLTMIN},{$PSUVOLTMAX})=0
trigger.name: System PSU voltage {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/IntegraX_System_Memory_used)>95
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/IntegraX_System_Memory_used)<90
trigger.name: System Memory usage {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/rintegraXradioAtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio A Temperature {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/rintegraXradioBtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio B Temperature {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: System contact details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Location name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/system.name,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/system.name,#2))=1 and length(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/system.name))>0
trigger.name: System name has changed (new name:{ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger.description: System name has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: System uptime
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/system.uptime[sysUpTime.0])<10m
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted (uptime < 10m)

dependency.name: No SNMP data collection
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=4
trigger.name: License unlimited

trigger.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0
trigger.name: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifLspPortStatus)=4 and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraiXifLspPortAdminState)<>1
trigger.name: backup link {HOST.PORT} activated

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifLspPortStatus)=3 and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraiXifLspPortAdminState)<>1
trigger.name: Backup port {HOST.PORT} no link

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=3 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysLicenseExpire)<=1209600
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=1 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=4 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXsysLicenseExpire)>1209600
trigger.name: Licence alarm
trigger.description: License expires within 2 weeks or already expired

dependency.name: License unlimited
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/uintegraXsysLicenseGenStatus)=4

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXifLspPortStatus)=2 and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraiXifLspPortAdminState)<>1
trigger.name: LSP port {HOST.PORT} blocked by LSP

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAxpdEst),{$XPDESTMIN},{$XPDESTMAX})=0 and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="XPIC"
trigger.name: ModemA XPD {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem A not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemAacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio A PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioApll)=1

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBxpdEst),{$XPDESTMIN},{$XPDESTMAX})=0 and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)="XPIC"
trigger.name: ModemB XPD {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

dependency.name: Modem B not synced
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemBacquireStatus)<>2

dependency.name: Radio B PLL Error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBpll)=1

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioAtxMute)=1 and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioAtxMuteDuration)<>1
trigger.name: Radio A Tx muted

dependency.name: Operational mode not XPIC or ACAP
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"XPIC" or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"ACAP"

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBtxMute)=1 and last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXradioBtxMuteDuration)<>1
trigger.name: Radio B Tx muted

dependency.name: Operational mode not XPIC or ACAP
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"XPIC" or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraXmodemConfigRunningTable)<>"ACAP"

item.host: SAF BASIC Integra-X template V30 for Zabbix 7.0
